post.body: we're in the play area @ mall so the younger boys loveit evan playing games on my phone, so we're managing. R u going back 2 mos?
@sberes still waiting.... They first told me it is and hr wait and now they are telling me 3!!!
are you @ mo & eds? We are still waiting for our tire to be fixed in milford...
i opened a case a few days ago through support@eye.fi just waiting to hear back on the next steps to get a replacement
I get a message saying memory card error, card locked. Support forums say 2 contact support tfor a replacement http://is.gd/ettA
see if you can snag the $10 off coupons for the met gift shop!
just sitting down to eat. Should we go to Times Square to show the kids the new years ball? You guys can meet us here 79th & Madison
take care of your sledding injuries, sit on some feather pillows and enjoy your day off!
meet us at 9am at the ffld train station
Bummer, my dog tested positive for lyme disease & ali just called saying 1 of our tires is shot & needs to be replaced. Not a good morning!
Back from nyc and ready for a good night's sleep and then another fun day tomorrow!
Eating @ Serafina on 79th & Madison. A tiny Greek Diner that's PACKED w/ people. E & I spent most of our time in modern art @ the Met. :-D
At the met the lines are NUTS! Have to get into city mode to push our way through!
On the 10am train to Grand Central 4 kids and 3 adults, we're out numbered! NYC look out, here we come!
Prob spending $40 on breakfast sandwiches at starbucks wondering if theres any chance in hell to make the 9:22 in fairfield...
Getting ready 4 NYC, going 2 the Met. @sberes, we'll call you when we're on the road. Still aiming to meet you @ 9am at the FFLD train statn
Damn, my new eye-fi memory card is broken found lots of others w/ the same problem on a google search. Not a good week 4 Nork electronics!
Hanging out with the Taddei's for a dinner & game night. Planning a trip tomorrow to NYC to take the fam to the Met w/ @sberes
